title: Locket Tooltip is broken
body: PBE tooltip for Locket is on Live for whatever reason, but the functionality is the same as the current one

replies.body:
Help and Support isn't the place to post bug reports:

>DO NOT post bug reports here. Instead, head on over to our [Report a Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) board.

That said this is a known issue and will presumably be fixed next patch or soon with a hotfix.
